com.okta.scim.server.exception

Class OnPremUserManagementException

  • Object
    • Throwable
      • Exception
        • RuntimeException
          • com.okta.scim.server.exception.internal.BaseOnPremUncheckedUMException
            • com.okta.scim.server.exception.OnPremUserManagementException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable

    public class OnPremUserManagementException
extends com.okta.scim.server.exception.internal.BaseOnPremUncheckedUMException
    This exception is thrown by the server when it cannot return the output when any exception condition occurs, such as inability to access the remote application, the remote application threw an exception, or internal issues. You can create an OnPremUserManagementException with any of the following four different properties.
    • Internal Code - Any arbitrary code to associate with the exception.
    • Description - Description for the exception.
    • Helper URL - If there is any URL for referral to help fix the issue.
    • Exception - Any associated exception.

    Note: For all exceptions, if the code throws the exception while processing a UM operation, the exception is serialized into a json string that is visible in Okta UI.

    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      message is a description for the exception.
